price: Ẹnikẹ́ni tí ó bá ń fẹ́ ẹ̀san nílé ayé, ṣebí lọ́dọ̀ Allāhu ní ẹ̀san ti ayé àti ti ọ̀run wà. Allāhu sì ń jẹ́ Olùgbọ́, Olùríran.
arabic: مَّن كَانَ يُرِيدُ ثَوَابَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا فَعِندَ ٱللَّهِ ثَوَابُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ سَمِيعَۢا بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: man kāna yurīdu thawāba al-dun'yā faʿinda al-lahi thawābu al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wakāna al-lahu samīʿan baṣīran
